PermissionSetExtensions.Name: D365 BUS FULL ACCESS - FE Reports

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: Specifies how the report will sort the Customers: Sales, to sort by sale volume; or balance. In either case, the Customers with the largest amounts will be shown first.

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: Specifies the number of Customers that will be included in the report.

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: Specifies the Date Filter applied to the EXR Top Customer Report Buffer.

Properties.Name: AboutText
Properties.Value: This report contains aggregated sales (LCY) and balance (LCY) data for the top number of customers selected. The data is aggregated for the period specified in the request page's Datefilter parameter.

Properties.Name: Summary
Properties.Value: Built in layout for the Customer - Top Trends excel report. This report contains aggregated sales (LCY) and balance (LCY) data for the top number of customers selected. Report uses Query connections.

Properties.Name: OptionCaption
Properties.Value: Due Date, Posting Date, Document Date

Properties.Name: CalcFormula
Properties.Value: lookup("G/L Account"."Account Type" where("No." = field("G/L Account No.")))

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: View and compare general ledger balances across the different business units.

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: View an analysis of your fixed assets with various types of data for both individual assets and groups of fixed assets.

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: View the calculated future depreciation and book value.

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: View detailed information about the fixed asset ledger entries that have been posted to a specified depreciation book for each fixed asset.

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: Specifies the date that you want the aging calculated for.

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: Specifies if the aging will be calculated from the due date, the posting date, or the document date.

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: Specifies the period for which data is sent to the report. For example, enter "-1M" for one month, "-30D" for thirty days, "-3Q" for three quarters, or "-5Y" for five years.

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: Specifies the number of periods for which data is sent to the report.

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: Specifies if you want to skip customers with a zero balance in the report.

Properties.Name: AboutText
Properties.Value: This report contains aggregated aging data based on customer ledger entries. The data is aggregated and bucketed according to the ‘Aged as of' and ‘period length' parameters in the reports request page. The aggregated data is summarized per the 2 global dimensions.

Properties.Name: Summary
Properties.Value: Built in layout for Aged Account Receivable. Pivot tables can be used to view the data per LCY and FCY and analyse amounts due by currency. Report uses Query connections.

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: Specifies the date that you want the aging calculated for.

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: Specifies if the aging will be calculated from the due date, the posting date, or the document date.

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: Specifies the period for which data is sent to the report. For example, enter "-1M" for one month, "-30D" for thirty days, "-3Q" for three quarters, or "-5Y" for five years.

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: Specifies the number of periods for which data is sent to the report.

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: Specifies if you want to skip Vendors with a zero balance in the report.

Properties.Name: AboutText
Properties.Value: This report contains aggregated aging data based on vendor ledger entries. The data is aggregated and bucketed according to the ‘Aged as of' and ‘period length' parameters in the reports request page. The aggregated data is summarized per the 2 global dimensions.

Properties.Name: Summary
Properties.Value: Built in layout for Aged Account Payable. Pivot tables can be used to view the data per LCY and FCY and analyse amounts due by currency. Report uses Query connections.

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: Specifies the starting date of the period for which the report is generated.

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: Specifies the ending date of the period for which the report is generated.

Properties.Name: AboutText
Properties.Value: This report contains Net Change or Balance of the different G/L Accounts for the selected period, aggregated per business unit.

Properties.Name: Summary
Properties.Value: Built in layout for Consolidated Trial Balance.

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: Specifies the code for the depreciation book to be included in the report or batch job.

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: Specifies the date when you want the report to start.

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: Specifies the date when you want the report to end.

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: Specifies if you want the report to show information only for sold fixed assets.

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: Specifies if you want the report to consider future depreciation and book value.

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: Specifies if you want to include inactive fixed assets in the report.

Properties.Name: AboutText
Properties.Value: This report shows different fixed asset details in the given time periods, such as book value, depreciation, and acquisitions. You can specify the starting and ending dates for the report, and whether you want to include only sold assets or include inactive fixed assets.

Properties.Name: Summary
Properties.Value: Built in layout for Fixed Asset Analysis.

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: Specifies the code for the depreciation book to be included in the report or batch job.

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: Specifies if you want to include reversed fixed asset entries in the report.

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: Specifies if you want to include inactive fixed assets in the report.

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: Specifies the Posting Date Filter to of fixed asset ledger entries to include in the report.

Properties.Name: AboutText
Properties.Value: This report shows ledger entries for one or more fixed assets.

Subtype.Name: FA Ledger Entry FA Posting Type

Properties.Name: DataItemTableView
Properties.Value: sorting("FA No.", "Depreciation Book Code", "FA Posting Date")

Properties.Name: Summary
Properties.Value: Built in layout for Fixed Asset Details.

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: Specifies the code for the depreciation book to be included in the report or batch job.

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: Specifies the date to be used as the first date in the period for which you want to calculate projected depreciation.

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: Specifies the Fixed Asset posting date of the last posted depreciation.

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: Specifies the length of the periods between the first depreciation date and the last depreciation date. The program then calculates depreciation for each period. If you leave this field blank, the program automatically sets the contents of this field to equal the number of days in a fiscal year, normally 360.

Properties.Name: Caption
Properties.Value: No. of Days in First Period

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: Specifies the number of days that must be used for calculating the depreciation as of the first depreciation date, regardless of the actual number of days from the last depreciation entry. The number you enter in this field does not affect the total number of days from the starting date to the ending date.

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: Specifies the fixed asset posting date from which the report includes all types of posted entries.

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: Specifies if you want the report to include projected disposals: the contents of the Projected Proceeds on Disposal field and the Projected Disposal Date field on the FA depreciation book.

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: Specifies if you want the periods between the starting date and the ending date to correspond to the accounting periods you have specified in the Accounting Period table. When you select this field, the Number of Days field is cleared.

Properties.Name: AboutText
Properties.Value: This report shows how Fixed Asset Ledger entries would look if depreciated in the given dates.

Subtype.Name: FA Ledger Entry FA Posting Type

Properties.Name: Summary
Properties.Value: Built in layout for Fixed Asset Projected Value.

Properties.Name: AdditionalSearchTerms
Properties.Value: FA Projected Value, FA Projected Value Excel

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: Specifies the Date Filter applied to the G/L Account.

Properties.Name: AboutText
Properties.Value: This report contains aggregated general ledger data for the trial balance with debit/credit columns for net change and balance. A report is shown for both local currency (LCY) and additional reporting currency (ACY, the latter only showing data if Additional Reporting Currency is in use. In addition to debit/credit for net change and balance the report shows the net debit/credit amount for both net change and balance for comparison. The aggregation is for the period specified in the report's request page's Datefilter parameter and summarized per the 2 global dimensions per g/l account category.

Properties.Name: Summary
Properties.Value: Built in layout for Trial Balance/Budget Excel. Customer facing sheet contains a pivot table that shows the account balance in local currency and additional reporting currencies. Report uses Query connections.

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: Specifies the Date Filter applied to the G/L Account.

Properties.Name: AboutText
Properties.Value: This report contains aggregated general ledger data for the trial balance with debit/credit columns for net change and balance. A report is shown for both local currency (LCY) and additional reporting currency (ACY), the latter only showing data if Additional Reporting Currency is in use. The aggregation is for the period specified in the report's request page's Datefilter parameter and summarized per the 2 global dimensions per g/l account category.

Properties.Name: Summary
Properties.Value: Built in layout for Trial Balance Excel. This report contains aggregated general ledger data for the trial balance with debit/credit columns for net change and balance. Report uses Query connections.

Properties.Name: AdditionalSearchTerms
Properties.Value: year closing,close accounting period,close fiscal year

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: Specifies the period for which data is shown in the report. For example, enter "1M" for one month, "30D" for thirty days, "3Q" for three quarters, or "5Y" for five years.

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: Specifies the Date Filter applied to the EXR Trial Bal. by Period Report.

Properties.Name: AboutText
Properties.Value: This report contains aggregated general ledger data per accounting period for the trial balance with a net debit/credit net change column for each period. The periods covered are specified in the report's request page's Datefilter parameter and summarized per the 2 global dimensions per g/l account category.

Properties.Name: Summary
Properties.Value: Built in layout for the Trial Balance by Period report. This report contains aggregated general ledger data per accounting period for the trial balance with a net debit/credit net change column for each period. Report uses Query connections.

Reports.Name: EXR Trial Bal by Period Excel

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: Specifies the Posting Date Filter to of fixed asset ledger entries to include in the report.

Properties.Name: AboutText
Properties.Value: This report contains aggregated general ledger data for the trial balance with debit/credit columns for net change and balance. A report is shown for both local currency (LCY) and additional reporting currency (ACY, the latter only showing data if Additional Reporting Currency is in use. In addition to debit/credit for net change and balance the report shows the net debit/credit amount for both net change and balance for comparison. The aggregation is for the period specified in the report's request page's Datefilter parameter and summarized per the 2 global dimensions per g/l account category.

Properties.Name: Summary
Properties.Value: Built in layout for the Trial Balance/Previous Year Excel report.This report contains aggregated general ledger data for the trial balance with debit/credit columns for net change and balance. Report uses Query connections.

Reports.Name: EXR Trial Bal. Prev Year Excel

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: Specifies how the report will sort the vendors: Purchases, to sort by purchase volume; or balance. In either case, the vendors with the largest amounts will be shown first.

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: Specifies the number of vendors that will be included in the report.

Properties.Name: ToolTip
Properties.Value: Specifies the Date Filter applied to the EXR Top Vendor Report Buffer.

Properties.Name: AboutText
Properties.Value: This report contains aggregated purchase (LCY) and balance (LCY) data for the top number of vendors selected. The data is aggregated for the period specified in the request page's Datefilter parameter.

Properties.Name: Summary
Properties.Value: Built in layout for the Vendor - Top Trends excel report. This report contains aggregated purchase (LCY) and balance (LCY) data for the top number of vendors selected. Report uses Query connections.
